Sure, I can help you with that! There are several options for laundry and transportation in Istanbul. Here are a few suggestions:

1. Hotel with laundry service: Many hotels in Istanbul offer laundry services, so you can check with the hotel you plan to stay at to see if they provide this service. Some high-end hotels may have a laundry service included in the room rate, while others may charge extra.
2. Laundromat: Istanbul has several laundromats, or "dokumac" in Turkish, where you can wash your clothes by hand or by machine. These are usually located in residential areas, so you may need to take a taxi or public transportation to get there. You can find laundromats by searching online or asking locals for recommendations.
3. Laundry service app: There are several laundry service apps available in Istanbul, such as LaundryBox and Washy, that allow you to schedule a pickup and delivery of your laundry. These services typically charge by the kilogram and offer a range of washing and drying options.

Regarding transportation from the airport, there are several options available:

1. Airport shuttle: Many hotels offer shuttle services from the airport, so you can check with your hotel to see if they offer this service.
2. Public transportation: You can take the metro or bus from the airport to your hotel. The airport is connected to the city center by several public transportation options, including the Metro (line M1A) and buses (such as the HAVABUS).
3. Taxi: Taxis are readily available at the airport and can take you to your hotel. Be sure to agree on the fare before you start your journey, as taxi prices can vary.
4. Private transfer: You can also book a private transfer service through a company such as Transfer Turkey or Istanbul Airport Transfers. These services will pick you up at the airport and take you to your hotel.

I hope this information helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.
